structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Waiver of regime -- Effect of encumbrances.
law.text: All of the co-owners or the sole owner of a building constituted into a horizontal property regime may waive this regime and request the county clerk to regroup or merge the records of the filial estates with the principal property, provided, that the filial estates are unencumbered, or if encumbered, that the creditors in whose behalf the encumbrances are recorded agree to accept as security the undivided portions of the property owned by the debtors.
